heroBanner.des: Get Crypto Loans Instantly, Regardless of Your Credit Rating

midBanner.title: Why borrow with us?
midBanner.des1: Banks are yesterdays news. Get the money you need without having to wait.
midBanner.des2: P2P lending lets you negotiate with the lender to arrange the best possible interest rates.
midBanner.des3: Put your assets to work so you can continue to meet your financial obligations.
midBanner.des4: Borrow without the background checks. Anyone can get the financing they need.

mainBanner.title: Become a Pawnshop
mainBanner.content: Open your own pawn shop and discover a new business opportunity with an unmatched ROI. Be a part of the world's financial revolution.

footer.detalAbout: DeFi For You is a trading style of Miles Mann Limited registered office at 5 Southgate Street, Gloucester, Gloucestershire, GL1 1TG1 Licensed authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority to exercise lender's rights and duties under a regulated credit agreement (excluding high-cost short-term credit, bill of sale agreement, and home collected credit agreement), and has the right to exercise lender's rights and duties under a regulated credit agreement (excluding high-cost short-term credit, bill of sale agreement, and home collected credit agreement)
